title:
Hello,



While visiting Wilmington, my Brother asked about the movie theaters downtown.  We could only remember the Bijou.  Could you please let me know the names of the other two theaters.  I believe one was on Market Street and the other on Front Street.  We use to save bottle caps to go to the Kids Matinees on Saturdays.



Thank you
text: Hello. Here's are links that will answer your question. http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20021017/NEWS/210170014?p=all&tc=pgall http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20021025/NEWS/210250313
